item.title: Stats: Boolean
item.description: The Boolean scalar type represents true or false. item.title: Stats: ID
item.description: The ID scalar type represents a unique identifier, often used to refetch an object or as key for a cache. The ID type appears in a JSON response as a String; however, it is not intended to be human-readable. When expected as an input type, any string (such as "4") or integer (such as 4) input value will be accepted as an ID. GraphQL schema definition Required by <li class="lifields"> <a href="/stats/reference/objects/stats"> Stats: </a> <span></span> </li> <li class="lifields"> <a href="/stats/reference/interfaces/node"> item.title: Stats: Int
item.description: The Int scalar type represents non-fractional signed whole numeric values. Int can represent values between -(2^31) and 2^31 - 1. GraphQL schema definition Required by <li class="lifields"> <a href="/stats/reference/objects/accessdata"> AccessData: </a> <span></span> </li> <li class="lifields"> <a href="/stats/reference/objects/groupconnection"> GroupConnection: </a> <span></span> </li> <li class="lifields"> <a href="/stats/reference/objects/supplierdata"> SupplierData: </a> <span></span> </li> <li class="lifields"> <a href="/stats/reference/objects/accessconnection"> AccessConnection: </a> <span></span> </li> <li class="lifields"> <a href="/stats/reference/objects/clientconnection"> ClientConnection: </a> <span></span> </li> <li class="lifields"> <a href="/stats/reference/inputobjects/supplierfilter"> SupplierFilter: </a> <span></span> </li> <li class="lifields"> <a href="/stats/reference/objects/groupdata"> GroupData: </a> <span></span> </li> <li class="lifields"> <a href="/stats/reference/objects/memberconnection"> MemberConnection: </a> <span></span> </li> <li class="lifields"> <a href="/stats/reference/objects/supplierconnection"> SupplierConnection: </a> <span></span> </li> <li class="lifields"> <a href="/stats/reference/objects/profileconnection"> ProfileConnection: </a> <span></span> </li> <li class="lifields"> <a href="/stats/reference/objects/statsinfo"> StatsInfo: </a> <span></span> </li> <li class="lifields"> <a href="/stats/reference/objects/statsasset"> StatsAsset: </a> <span></span> </li>

item.title: Stats: String
item.description: The String scalar type represents textual data, represented as UTF-8 character sequences. The String type is most often used by GraphQL to represent free-form human-readable text.
